name: DLedger-0.3.1
body:
## What's Changed
* [ISSUE #231] Fix run DLedger Server with jar can't find Main class by @mxsm in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/232
* [ISSUE #234] Add enableCleanSpaceService config for statemachine by @RongtongJin in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/234
* [ISSUE #236] Do not enable clean space service after registering the state machine by @RongtongJin in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/237


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/compare/dledger-all-0.3.0...dledger-all-0.3.1

name: DLedger-0.3.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix DLedgerServer The code is not formatted correctly by @mxsm in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/174
* Update rocketmq-remoting version 4.3.2 to 4.9.4 by @mxsm in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/178
* Use the link to be redirected correctly by @jizhideluyi in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/175
* Fix Method is on the same line as the Override code style issue by @mxsm in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/181
* Optimize DLedgerLeaderElector.maintainAsCandidate code by @mxsm in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/193
* Scoping log4j libraries to test by @lizhanhui in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/196
* Fix DLedgerMmapFileStore#recover method throw java.nio.BufferUnderflowException by @mxsm in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/186
* Add a lightweight log implementation slf4j-simple by @RongtongJin in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/198
* DLedger page cache overtime by @yewenhai-github in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/200
* Optimize BossCommand code and add ServerCommand by @mxsm in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/194
* Fix comment word typo by @mxsm in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/205
* Feat(dledger server): add a method to inform us whether DLedger i… by @TheR1sing3un in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/206
* Support multi-raft by @TheR1sing3un in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/150
* Style(main): remove unused import by @TheR1sing3un in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/207
* Feat(main): support starting up with config file by @TheR1sing3un in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/209
* DefaultMmapFile memory usage Optimize by @mxsm in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/190
* Unable to Start DLedger without config.yaml by @tsunghanjacktsai in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/211
* Separate library and cli tools by @lizhanhui in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/212
* Fix Checkstyle Error by @tsunghanjacktsai in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/214
* Polish the pom file by @RongtongJin in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/216
* Add ASF header to new pom file by @RongtongJin in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/218
* Separating DLedgerProxy from the DLedger as a new module by @TheR1sing3un in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/220
* Polish the code after separating DLedgerProxy module by @RongtongJin in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/222
* Fix(main): fix the append process when DLedger group only has one node by @TheR1sing3un in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/223
* Remove duplicate tests and renamed some tests name by @RongtongJin in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/225
* Make ConfigUtilsTest can pass by @RongtongJin in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/227
* Say github action to run tests by @RongtongJin in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/228
* Update README file mark snapshot feature to WIP by @RongtongJin in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/229

## New Contributors
* @jizhideluyi made their first contribution in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/175
* @lizhanhui made their first contribution in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/196
* @yewenhai-github made their first contribution in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/200
* @TheR1sing3un made their first contribution in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/206

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/compare/dledger-0.2.7...dledger-all-0.3.0

name: DLedger-0.2.7
body:
## What's Changed
* Update org.slf4j-log4j12@1.7.6 to org.slf4j-log4j12@1.7.36 by @tsunghanjacktsai in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/154
* Make StateMachineCaller thread will not exit when throw exception by @RongtongJin in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/155
* Update log4j v1 to log4j v2 by @tsunghanjacktsai in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/156
* [ISSUE #157] fix code format problem by @mxsm in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/158
* [ISSUE#159] fix DLedgerClient the log format is incorrect by @mxsm in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/160
* Export remoting client for dledger server by @RongtongJin in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/172
* [ISSUE #162] fix sync stopped when upgrade 0.2.6 from 0.2.2 by @cserwen in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/163
* [ISSUE#161]optimize the thread pool ThreadFactory implementation by @mxsm in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/170

## New Contributors
* @tsunghanjacktsai made their first contribution in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/154
* @mxsm made their first contribution in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/158

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/compare/dledger-0.2.6...dledger-0.2.7

name: DLedger-0.2.6
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix obtain pair from batchPendingMap by @Git-Yang in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/141
* Fix replica cannot be synced by @Git-Yang in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/143
* Remove redundant parameter. by @wanglunhui2012 in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/147
* Expose nettyRemotingServer by @hzh0425 in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/153

## New Contributors

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/compare/dledger-0.2.5...dledger-0.2.6

name: DLedger-0.2.5
body:
This release fixes some bugs and support state machine for dledger

## What's Changed
* [ISSUE #126] The class DLedgerProtocolHander name should be DLedgerProtocolHandler by @llIlll in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/127
* [ISSUE #125] fix hanged unavailable file in deleteExpiredFileByTime by @yuz10 in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/124
* [ISSUE #130] update authors in license by @yuz10 in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/129
* Feature: add statemachine for dledger by @hzh0425 in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/128
* Feature: let dledger complete responseFutures after applying entries to statemachine by @hzh0425 in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/132
* Add Statemachine feature for DLedger by  @hzh0425 in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/133
* [ISSUE #134] fix batch push error by @Git-Yang in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/137
* BugFix: fix bug in statemachine mode by @hzh0425 in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/139

## New Contributors
* @llIlll made their first contribution in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/127
* @hzh0425 made their first contribution in https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/pull/128

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openmessaging/dledger/compare/dledger-0.2.4...dledger-0.2.5

name: DLedger-0.2.4
body:
This release fixes some bugs and support multi-dirs storage

## Feature
 #119 Support multi-dirs storage

## Bug
#123  Fix high CPU in EntryDispatcher
#89 DLedgerMmapFileStore move flushedWhere pos after truncate file
#106 Fix preferred leader bug

## Enhancement
#112 It is better for the peer with the smallest lag(fall behind index) to become the transferee.
#110 Use df algorithm to calculate the disk used ratio
#117 Some class's method lost annotation 'Override'
#104 The variable DLedgerMmapFileStore#isDiskFull should be decorated with the volatile.
#115 Bump junit to 5.8.2
#121 Fix check style error

name: DLedger-0.2.3
body:
This release fixes some bugs and support multiple preferred leaders

## Feature
 #90 Support multiple preferred leaders (#91) 

## Bug
#87 Fix the expiration problem of the push message 
#89 DLedgerMmapFileStore move flushedWhere pos after truncate file

## Enhancement
#97 Performance optimization
#94 Batch push compatible with the single push

name: DLedger-0.2.2
body:
This release fix single node with error response when batch append and replace to ALV2 license header.

## Bug
#75 Fix single node with error response when batch append

## Enhancement
#76 Replace the ALV2 license header

name: DLedger-0.2.1
body:
This release implement batch entry append for dledger and fix bug of getting peers address.

## Feature
#67 Support batch entry append

## Bug
#73 Fix peers different length case

## Enhancement
#72  Bump junit from 4.11 to 4.13.1

name: DLedger-0.2.0
body:
This release implement preferred leader and added full support for batch replication. In addition, this release also fixed some important bugs and further improved the stability of dledger such as high tolerance of asymmetric network partition.

## Feature

#18 Implement preferred leader
#45 Support batch replication

## Bug

#25 Asymmetric network partition may lead to re-election all the time
#31 Error in getting peer address in k8s environment
#32 Travis JDK swither not found exception
#37 Cluster may re-elect after network partition heal
#39 Services may be unavailable all the time when network partition happen 
#43 Fix RPC module null pointer exception handling
#46 Fix the heartbeat and voting block caused by invokeAsync
#50 The replication was blocked after the file was deleted
#53 Make ledgerEndTerm be equals with logs term if it is not a leader
#69 Fix peers address parsing error

## Improvement

#12 Delete the useless variable for the number of shutdowns
#22 Optimize the Implementation of preferred leader
#48 Polish the election process
#49 Change a way to calculate quorumIndex
#56 Add volatile for needIncreaseTermImmediately variable
#71 Add log when quota exhaust

## Code style and document

#13 Optimize the code style about JCommander
#40 Polish readme document
#41 Add maven central badge to readme doc
#55 Optimize the code style about quorum check
